tool_description: Real-time and historical data about every reported United States drone strike.
name: Dronestream
title: Dronestream

api_list.name: All US drone strikes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joshbegley-dronestream.p.rapidapi.com/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joshbegley-dronestream.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://joshbegley-dronestream.p.rapidapi.com/data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joshbegley-dronestream.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
